summary: Partial progress on Phase 1: buildSeedAux_preserves_mem_general mostly proven (9 of 10 cases complete). Added helper lemmas createNewFamily_preserves_mem_getFormulas' and createNewTime_preserves_mem_getFormulas' without preconditions. Build passes with 0 errors, 11 sorries (same count as baseline but different distribution).

artifacts.summary: Extended monotonicity proof for buildSeedAux with 9/10 cases complete

partial_progress.details: buildSeedAux_preserves_mem_general now has 9 of 10 formula cases proven. The generic Formula.imp catchall case remains sorried due to pattern matching complexity. New helper lemmas added for createNewFamily and createNewTime.
remaining_work: Complete generic imp case in buildSeedAux_preserves_mem_general
Use monotonicity to prove buildSeed_contains_formula cases

completion_data.completion_summary: Partial progress on Phase 1 multi-formula seed builder. The key blocking lemma buildSeedAux_preserves_mem_general is now 90% complete (9/10 formula cases proven). Added two helper lemmas for membership preservation. Build clean with 0 errors.
